title: Frost World Dungeon (Part 1)
body:
Frost World Dungeon (Part 1)

Seeing Evan didn't say anything Valery also didn't insist further and focused on driving.

The frost world dungeon is quite far away from the academy, and It will take them five hours to reach there.

Evan never got a chance to visit the city properly so after he stopped talking with Valery he started to look outside.

He thought about asking how she know so many things about the higher world, and why this information is not available in the library, but after careful consideration, he didn't ask about it.

She already told him many things that he wasn't aware about, and since this information is not available in the library and on the Internet, it is clear the source of the information will not be normal.

He doesn't want to get himself involved in some kind of secret organization sh*t that often appears in novels that he used to read in his past life.
